descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Kevin Huerter drives through traffic with ease and hits the fadeaway jumper.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Huerter slices through the Hornets' defense for the jumper) 2021/4/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Huerter slices through the Hornets' defense for the jumper

videos.description: Lou Williams and Clint Capela execute the give-and-go to perfection for an alley-oop slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Capela throws down alley-oop from Lou Will) 2021/4/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Capela throws down alley-oop from Lou Will

videos.description: Jalen McDaniels rises for the two-handed slam over Clint Capela.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (McDaniels takes flight to posterize Capela) 2021/4/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: McDaniels takes flight to posterize Capela

videos.description: Trae Young can't contain his excitement after Bogdan Bogdanovic drills a deep 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bogdanovic's deep 3-pointer gets Trae hyped) 2021/4/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bogdanovic's deep 3-pointer gets Trae hyped

videos.description: Devonte' Graham slips the pass to Bismack Biyombo for a two-handed jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Graham and Biyombo perfectly execute the pick-and-roll) 2021/4/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Graham and Biyombo perfectly execute the pick-and-roll

videos.description: Miles Bridges shows no mercy on Clint Capela with a thunderous throwdown.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Dunk of the year? Bridges viciously posterizes Capela) 2021/4/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dunk of the year? Bridges viciously posterizes Capela

videos.description: Lou Williams blows by Brad Wanamaker for a clutch go-ahead layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lou Will floats go-ahead layup high off the glass) 2021/4/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lou Will floats go-ahead layup high off the glass
